## Inspecting (less)

- **less** - view content of a file

```
less <file name>
```

![](img/less.PNG){width=700}

![](img/less_output.PNG){width=500}

Press **Q** to exit


## Inspecting (cat)

- **cat** - concatenates and displays the content of a file

```
cat <file name>
```

![](img/cat.PNG){width=700}

Be aware of using **cat** on large files


## Inspecting (head)

- **head** - view the first rows of a file

```
head <file name>
```

![](img/head.PNG){width=300}


## Inspecting (head)

- **head** - view the first rows of a file

```
head -n <nr of lines> <file name>
```

![](img/head4.PNG){width=300}

Default of n is 10

## Inspecting (tail)

- **tail** - view the last rows of a file

```
tail <file name>
```

![](img/tail.PNG){width=300}

## Inspection (tail)

- **tail** - view the last rows of a file

```
tail -n <nr of lines> <file name>
```

![](img/tail4.PNG){width=300}

Default of n is 10


## Manipulating (touch)

- **touch** - create empty file or update time stamp

```
touch <name of new file>
```

![](img/touch.PNG){width=300}

## Manipulating (nano)

- **nano** - edit content of a file

```
nano <file name>
```

![](img/nano.PNG){width=600}

![](img/nano_editor.PNG){width=700}

## Manipulating (nano)

- **nano** - edit content of a file

```
nano <file name>
```

![](img/nano_filled.PNG){width=700}

To save: **Ctrl + O**, press **Enter** <br>
To exit: **Ctrl + X**, press **Enter**


## Summary

- **less** - view content of a file
- **head** - view the first rows of a file
- **tail** - view the last rows of a file
- **touch** - create empty file or update time stamp
- **nano** - edit content of a file
